name: Snake Ball vs Block
description:
Now the Snake Balls classic game comes back in a new way 

Snake Balls vs Blocks is a most addicted game among the children to elder . A super Snake is made by many balls, fed ball by balls. Balls snake went through the blocks and find balls to eat and break the blocks to run out. Balls snake have to make him become longer and stronger or he’ll died in this adventure.

Snake Ball vs Blocks! FREE!

How to play
Snake Ball vs Blocks Hit Game
Easy to play but hard to master for high scores!
Swipe your finger across the screen to eat the balls and break the blocks.
Collect as much as possible balls to make longer snake.
You will lose the ball as figure shown in block when you hit it!
Try to break as many blocks as possible.
Get additional balls and make the biggest snake ever!

Snake Ball vs Blocks Features:
FREE to play, No Internal purchase requires!
Play ENDLESS snake Ball vs blocks.
Simple swipe control.
No age limit.
Perfect time killer , Release stress , Relaxed game play.
Very interesting! Relax yourself , mind fresh game.
